calculate_group_transition_freq

calculate_group_transition_freq.Rd

calculate SNP transition frequency per group

Usage

calculate_group_transition_freq(x, var)

Arguments

x

dataframe of JH4 pipeline output

var

column name to group by

absolute

defaults to TRUE to return SNP counts from all reads, else return SNP counts from unique sequences
